detailsData.title: Community Involvement
detailsData.content: Our involvement in the community and in the legal profession has not gone unnoticed. We are recognized for professional achievements and civic involvement.

detailsData.title: Referral Trust
detailsData.content: We receive countless referrals from our legal colleagues and our clients. This trust is a testament to the quality and effectiveness of our legal services.

detailsData.title: Personal Service
detailsData.content: You can trust that your case will be addressed in personal and strategic ways. You will be treated in a caring and sophisticated manner.

detailsData.title: Contingency Fee Basis
detailsData.content: Our Pittsburgh injury lawyers handle cases on a contingency fee basis. There will be no attorneys’ fees or costs if you do not recover money damages in a settlement or jury verdict.

valueProp: Since 1993 we have provided the community with effective, quality representation & personal client service. Our Pittsburgh injury lawyers are recognized as one of the pre-eminent law firms providing a range of legal services for clients throughout western and central Pennsylvania.

testimonalData.text: We don’t have enough kind words to describe how much we appreciate Dan. 2023 was a rough year for us. Dan was a constant source of support to us as he took us through a process we could have never navigated alone. We received nothing but professionalism, communication and respect from him.
testimonalData.author: Julie

testimonalData.text: Brandon Keller was a wonderful soul to deal with, he truly cares and was always available when I had any questions. No worries, no stress. I thank God for putting him in my life.
testimonalData.author: Denise

testimonalData.text: Erin Rudert represented me in an auto accident case. My case is complex, in that I had a pre-existing condition worsened by the car wreck of which I was not at fault. The complexity had another attorney who had taken the case abandon it once they saw the work involved.
testimonalData.author: Alex
